elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} You may discard a Character from your Reserve. If you do: Discard all other cards in play and in Reserve.  When I leave the Expedition zone — []Put the top two cards of your deck in your Mana zone (as exhausted Mana Orbs).
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Character you play this turn loses [[Fleeting]].
